title: New: IYES – Breathe
body:
Brighton duo **IYES** have been one of the most buzzed about acts of the past twelve months, and quite rightly so.

With their debut single _‘Til Infinity_ and their _Crazy In Love_ cover clocking up over 500k plays between them, the duo are hitting 2014 running. New single, Breathe, is their biggest pop number to date, again utilising their knack for finding a huge chorus and their magical dual vocals. Check out _Breathe_ below, out now on iTunes and Spotify.
